GridObject

The base class for GridPublish objects

Summary
GridObjectThe base class for GridPublish objects
Functions
setTemplateAssigns a template string to the object
getTemplateRetrieves the currently assigned template
loadTemplateLoads a template from a file
introspectDescribes a template in terms of its definable properties
evaluateEvaluates a template based on its defined properties
__toStringAn alias of the method evaluate, also a PHP “magic method”

Functions

setTemplate

public function setTemplate($content =  '')

Assigns a template string to the object

Arguments

$contentThe template content

Returns

True on success, false on failure [boolean].

See also

getTemplate, loadTemplate, introspect, evaluate

getTemplate

public function getTemplate()

Retrieves the currently assigned template

Arguments

None.

Returns

The currently assigned template [string].

See also

setTemplate, loadTemplate, introspect, evaluate

loadTemplate

public function loadTemplate($filename)

Loads a template from a file

Arguments

$filenameThe template file to load [string].

Returns

True on success (boolean), throws an exception on failure.

See also

setTemplate, getTemplate, introspect, evaluate

introspect

public function introspect($content =  null)

Describes a template in terms of its definable properties

Arguments

$content(optional) A template to introspect on.  If not set, the currently assigned template is introspected [string].

Returns

An associative array of variables and blocks [array].

See also

setTemplate, getTemplate, loadTemplate, evaluate

evaluate

public function evaluate($content =  null)

Evaluates a template based on its defined properties

Arguments

$content(optional) A template string to be evaluated.  If not set, the currently assigned template is evaluated [string].

Returns

The evaluated template [string].

See also

setTemplate, getTemplate, loadTemplate, introspect

__toString

public function __toString()

An alias of the method evaluate, also a PHP “magic method”

Arguments

None.

Returns

The evaluated template [string].

See also

evaluate
